    • Constructor Detail

      • ModifierDetector

        public ModifierDetector(Corpus corpus,
                        java.io.File[] modifierLexica,
                        boolean[] modifierDetectionSettings,
                        int modifierDetectionMethod,
                        int n)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads lexica and starts modifier annotation according to the settings
        Parameters:
        corpus - To be processed corpus
        modifierLexica - Array that contains the negation, intensifier and diminisher lexicon
        modifierDetectionSettings - Says which modifier types are supposed to be considered
        modifierDetectionMethod - Says which modifier detection method is supposed to be used
        n - Modifies next n tokens after a modifier has occured
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if the lexica can not be read or if an invalid modifier detector method is selected
